name: Power Spectral Density
description: Analyzes the power spectrum slope in the frequency domain. Natural images follow a characteristic 1/f power law while AI images deviate from this pattern.
mechanism: Computes 2D FFT power spectrum and analyzes radial averages. Deviations from the natural 1/f power law indicate AI generation.
parameters: FFT size: adaptive, Averaging: radial, Metric: spectral slope
useCase: Detecting spectral deviations from natural 1/f power law
